abstract: IAC has just introduced 236.com, a fake news site. Seen that idea before? So did Barry Diller, who, like Microsoft, is trying to profit from the ideas of others.
snippet: IAC has just introduced 236.com, a fake news site. Seen that idea before? So did Barry Diller, who, like Microsoft, is trying to profit from the ideas of others.
lead_paragraph: I get it now: Barry Diller wants IAC/InterActiveCorp to be the Microsoft of the Internet. I’m not saying that he seeks world domination and monopoly power over a billion computers. I always assumed he wanted that. With his imposing stature, bellowing voice and reflective ruminations, Mr. Diller is always the Internet figure most likely to be confused for a villain in a James Bond movie. IAC’s starship of a headquarters on the Hudson River is certainly playing to type there.
